document.full_text: libyan rebels reported heavy fighting in the besieged city of misrata on tuesday and france said nato must step up bombing to stop muammar gaddafi's forces attacking civilians.
document.title: france says nato must do more in libya
lines_and_colors: libyan rebels reported heavy fighting in the besieged city of misrata on tuesday and france said nato must step up bombing to stop muammar gaddafi's forces attacking civilians.
